48628.「この塔 何百年も昔から あるんだって。\n うちのおじいちゃんが 言ってたわ。:
This tower has been around for hundreds of
years. My grandpa told me.

48629.<attr><feel_normal_lv1><end_attr>「……キラキラ:
You want to know about Glitter Windmill Tower? Well, my grandpa told me about it. This great windmill tower was built hundreds of years ago
by a royal architect named Proppe, who was good at magic tricks. And among the potted plants called "propeller plants" on the top
floor of the tower, there's only one that was built by Mr. Proppe.

48630.<attr><feel_normal_lv3><end_attr>「なんと それ:
What's more, if you give them a special water called Refreshing Soda, they can listen to the words that Mr. Proppe has memorized in his
karakuri! You can get Refreshing Soda from <%sEV_QUE_NAME0> around the soda fountain in Wrinkle Region. It is said to be a very strong
monster, so be careful if you go to get it.

48631.<attr><feel_normal_lv1><end_attr>「この塔を作っ:
The tower was built hundreds of years ago by a royal architect named Proppe. On the top floor of the tower, there is a pot plant called
"propeller plant," and one of the plants has been built with a magic mechanism. If you give him the Refreshing Soda that <%SEV_QUE_NAME0>
drops around the soda fountain, he will speak to you. Be careful, <%sEV_QUE_NAME0> is a very strong monster.

48632.<attr><feel_normal_lv1><end_attr>「あっ さわや:
Oh, you received Refreshing Soda! If you feed it to the magic propeller weed on the top floor of this tower, you'll hear what Mr.
Proppe has to say. The magic propeller weed is very different from the other propeller weeds, so if you look carefully, you will be able to
recognize it.

48633.<attr><feel_think_lv1><end_attr>「プロッペさんの:
<attr><feel_think_lv1><end_attr>It sounds like you got a word in from Mr.
Proppe. What were they?<bw_break>

48634.<attr><feel_happy_one><end_attr>「……へー。キラ:
<attr><feel_happy_one><end_attr>Wow, I didn't know the smiling face on the
Glitter Windmill Tower had such a meaning.
Maybe I'll take a closer look next time.

48635.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「キラキラ大風車:
<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>Glitter Windmill Tower is smiling today! You
should take the time to look at it too.

55375.<attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>「あたし お天気お姉:
I'm Pupuna, the weather girl. My job is to observe the sky every day on this balloon. Hmm. My hairs are a bit unsettled today. I
think it's better not to hang out the futon tomorrow.

113851.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「あたし キラキ:
I'm a cook on assignment at Glitter Windmill Tower! I'm working hard and quietly here to make the food we serve to our customers taste
even more delicious and safe~!

48145.「のどかで いい場所ですね。\n ここにいると わたくしは どうしてあんなに\n:
It's a nice, peaceful place. I find myself wondering why I used to work so hard when I was here. I feel a sense of peace and
relaxation that I didn't notice when I was working all the time.

48146.「のどかで いい場所ですね。\n ここにいると わたくしは どうしてあんなに\n:
It's a nice, peaceful place. I find myself wondering why I used to work so hard when I was here. When I look at the windmills and
balloons, I feel a sense of peace and relaxation that I didn't notice when I was working all the time. What? Kranoch asked you
to find me? I apologize for the trouble I have caused you. Indeed, I am the medal owner's second butler, Renoch. Hmmm... You mean to say
that Master Golek feels responsible for my not returning and is distressed? Is that so? How could I have done that without thanking Master
Golek for releasing me from prison? I also have the Mini Medal that I collected from the travelers while I was in prison. I understand.
I'll be right back.

48147.「ご安心ください。\n わたくしは あなたを お見送りしたら\n すぐに ゴーレ:
Rest assured, I will return to Master Golek as soon as I see you off. I will return to Master Golek as soon as I see you off. Would you like
to know why I didn't go straight back to the master after I was let out of jail?

48148.「自分で言うのもなんですが わたくしは\n 主人に忠実で 仕事熱心な男でした。\:
I can't say it myself, but I was a man who was faithful to his master and hardworking. But one day, as I was living in that prison, it
was as if a thread snapped and everything became unimportant. I will never forget that feeling of freedom. And now that I am free and
clear, I have come here to follow my heart. When I look at windmills and balloons, I feel a sense of peace and relaxation that I could
not find when I was working all the time.

48149.「そうですか。\n では あなたも わたくしの思いに\n 共感できるような体験が:
I see. Then I guess you must have had some experiences that you can relate to my thoughts. Working hard is important, but I
have learned that sometimes it is necessary to take a break. Everything is good in moderation.

48150.「ゴーレック様の所へ ちいさなメダルを\n 届けにいってきました。\n<br>\:
I went to Mr. Golek's place to deliver Mini Medal. He was very pleased. He gave me a special long vacation. I am very grateful. Oh,
yes. I found this in my pocket. I'll give it to you for the time being.

50805.「わたくしは もうしばらく\n ここで 風車や 気球をながめながら\n のんびり:
I'm going to stay here for a while longer and
rest while watching windmills and balloons.

50806.「ゴーレック様の所へ ちいさなメダルを\n 届けにいってきました。\n<br>\:
I went to deliver a Mini Medal to Mr. Golek's place. He was very pleased. He gave me a special long vacation. I am very grateful. I'm
going to stay here for a while longer and rest while looking at windmills and balloons.

50807.<pc>は\nちいさなメダルを 受け取った！<se_nots System It: <pc> received a Mini Medal!<se_nots System Item>

54547.<attr><feel_think_lv3><end_attr>「私の姉は ちょ:
My sister is a bit of an eccentric, creating magical tailoring techniques! She was always dreaming about creating magic tailoring. She's
always dreaming of creating magical tailoring, and her daughter has taken over the City of Megistris, dressing up in dubious outfits and
performing magical tailoring! She's saying things like that. She's not a child anymore.It's a real problem.

54548.<attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>「……え？ 秘伝のト:
What? You want Secret Birdlime? Popol sent you, didn't he? You don't have to play the true sword with her story. Popol is what he is
because of his mother, my sister who passed away. She was a dreamer.She was the one who dreamed up all the dreams, and she influenced
my daughter, Popol, with her magical tailoring and her weird ideas. She believes her sister's notes.I wish she would learn to distinguish
between reality and fantasy, since she is not a child. Anyway, here's the Secret Birdlime.It's just a secret trick I learned
from my grandmother.

54550.<attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>「ポポルの話に 真剣:
You don't have to play true sword with Popol's story. She is what she is because of Popol's mother, my sister who passed away. She was a
dreamer.She was the one who talked about dreamy things, and Popol was influenced by her and started talking about magical tailoring
and other strange things. She believes everything she reads in her notes. I wish she would learn to distinguish between reality and
fantasy, since she is not a child.

54551.「ええっ！ ポポルの魔法仕立て術が成功した！？ \n しかも その術を使って メ:
What? Popol's magical tailoring technique has succeeded!And he used that technique to open a Dress-up Shop in the City of Megistris?
Really. So my sister's story was true. I'm sorry for calling you out on your bullshit.

71743.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「現在 美容院:
Salon Salon Fee Lycia is currently preparing for its grand opening. Our staff is working very hard and putting in all of our effort!
Salon Fee Lycia, your best partner to become beautiful, will be opening more salons in City of Megistris and all over the country. We look
forward to seeing you soon!

71744.<attr><feel_sad_one><end_attr>「私 美容院 サロン:
I am in charge of masscrewing at Salon Fee Lycia, and I would like to ask you a favor. I see that you are a strong person, so I have a
favor to ask. I was on my way back from buying samples of new coffee beans to serve to our customers when the monster took them away from
me. Please return all <%nEV_QUE_T_NUM0> of the delicious 3-Star Blend Beans from the monsters around here!

71745.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「ありがとうござ:
Thank you! The 3-Star Blend Beans were taken by all the monsters in Windmill Way. It doesn't matter which Windmill Way monster it
is. Just defeat them and get back the 3-Star Blend Beans! I know it's not easy since there are so many of them, but please do your best!

71746.<attr><feel_think_lv1><end_attr>「助かります！:
Thank you very much! I'd like to get started right away, but you seem to be busy with other requests. If you have some free time, could
you call on me again later? Thank you very much!

71747.<attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>「……そうですよね。:
<attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>That's right. I should do something about it
myself, not relying on others. Yeah, but I
can't fight the monster.

71748.<attr><feel_normal_lv1><end_attr>「風車の丘にい:
<attr><feel_normal_lv1><end_attr>The monsters on Windmill Way took 3-Star Blend
Beans <%nEV_QUE_T_NUM0>. They are delicious
coffee beans with aroma.<open_irai><bw_break>

71749.<attr><feel_sad_one><end_attr>「どうか 三つ星ブレ:
<attr><feel_sad_one><end_attr>Please get 3-Star Blend Beans back from the
monsters on Windmill Way! Please!

71750.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「おかえりなさい:
<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>Welcome back! Did you get back the 3-Star
Blend Beans <%nEV_QUE_T_NUM0> already?

71751.<attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>「そうですよね。いく:
That's right. No matter how strong and capable you seem, there is no way you can get it back so quickly. I'm sorry for rushing you. Please
continue to work with us!

71752.<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>「ひい ふう み:
Hi, Phew, Mii, sure, I have all of them! Thank you very much. Now our guests can enjoy a relaxing drink. Yes, it's true! The 3-Star
Blend Beans are not only for coffee service, but also for salon use. Let's ask our beauticians to create a relaxing new latte
color for you. Please try it when you come to the salon.

71753.<attr><feel_happy_one><end_attr>「ささやかですが:
<attr><feel_happy_one><end_attr>This is a small token of my appreciation.
Please pay it in full.

71754.<attr><feel_happy_one><end_attr>「この カフェラ:
This latte color is available at all Salon Salon Fee Lycia locations. All of our staff are looking forward to serving you, so please
visit us! Thank you very much!

71755.プチーノに\n三つ星ブレンド豆を 渡しますか？<yesno><case 1><b: Would you give 3-Star Blend Beans to Puchino?<yesno><case 1><break><case 2><close><case_cancel><close><case_end>

71757.美容院で 新しい色\n『カフェラテ』が 使えるようになった！<me 71>: A new color "latte" is now available at Salon!<me 71>

71758.<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>「美容院 サロン:
Salon Fee Lycia is open 24 hours a day, 7 days a week to enhance your beauty. Please feel free to visit us anytime. The owner, Fe Lycia,
and all of our staff look forward to serving you!

54537.「このキラキラ大風車塔は 何百年もの歴史を持つ\n 世界的にも 有名な建造物でし:
The Glitter Windmill Tower is a centuries-old,
world-famous structure. It is a tourist
attraction.

35048.<attr><feel_think_lv1><end_attr>「大陸中を見渡せ:
I came all the way here because I heard that there is a tower from which you can see the whole continent, but I heard that there are
monsters in the Ritual Hall on the top floor. I came here as a tourist, but if I get attacked by a monster, it would be such a
stupid story.

35050.「なんでも この塔は 神聖な場所だから\n 魔物も 寄りつかないらしいわ。\n<:
I heard that this tower is a sacred place, so monsters don't come close to it. But it's kind of funny that monsters appear at the top of
the tower, isn't it?

35051.「くわしいことは 知らないが\n この塔のおかげで プクランド大陸は\n 今日ま:
I don't know the details, but it is said that thanks to this tower, Pukuland Continent has been protected until today. I heard that the
secret is hidden in the room at the top of the tower, but recently there are rumors of a monster appearing there.

35052.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「メギストリス名:
<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>Welcome to Megistris' famous Glitter Windmill
Tower, travellers! Look up so high your neck
will get tired.

35053.「これは 塔の最上層に通じるエレベーターだ。\n だが 最上層には 魔物が出るら:
This is an elevator that leads to the top floor of the tower. However, there seems to be a monster on the top floor. King Puupoppan is
also worried about it.

35054.キラキラ大風車塔の最上層へ行く\nエレベーターがある。\nスイッチを押して 移動:
There is an elevator that goes to the top
floor of Glitter Windmill Tower.<yesno><close>

35055.「キラキラ大風車塔を 観光した後は\n ぜひ 当店で 疲れをいやしてくださいね。:
After a day of sightseeing at Glitter Windmill Tower, please come and relax at our restaurant. We will make you feel at home in
our soft beds.

35057.<attr><feel_think_lv2><end_attr>「この塔は 神聖:
I heard that this tower is a sacred place and monsters don't come close to it, but a few minutes ago, a strike force member climbed up
there. I can't believe that a monster would enter a sacred place. I wonder if it's because of demon miasma.

35058.「メギストリス名物 キラキラ大風車塔へ\n ようこそ！ 旅の方！！\n ……ん？:
Welcome to Megistris Specialty Glitter Windmill Tower! Travelers! Hmmm? No? Oh, you're the strike force? But still, is there a
monster in this tower? Well, I'm too scared to go to the top of the tower, so I don't know.

35059.「貴様も 討伐隊の一員なのか？\n 他の討伐隊の者たちは\n このエレベーターで:
Are you a member of the strike force? Other
members of the strike force climbed to the top
with this elevator.

35061.<attr><feel_think_lv2><end_attr>「塔の上から か:
<attr><feel_think_lv2><end_attr>I thought I heard a faint scream from above
the tower. Was it my imagination?

35063.<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>「へえ 塔には魔:
Oh, there were no monsters in the tower? If that's the case, it's a good thing, isn't it? What? You think it's a problem that there
aren't any? What do you mean? It would have been more troublesome if they were there. You're such a strange person.

35064.「メギストリス名物 キラキラ大風車塔へ\n ようこそ！ 討伐隊の人！！\n<br:
Welcome to Megistris specialty Glitter Windmill Tower! The strike force people! What's up? Are you going back to the castle
already? Why don't you take your time to see the sights since you've come all this way?

35065.「おや 他の討伐隊の者は どうしたのだ？\n ……なに？ 塔に 魔物などおらず\:
Oh, what happened to the rest of the strike force? What? There are no monsters in the tower, but soldiers under Id-sama's command
attacked us! What are you talking about in your sleep?If you insist on telling the truth, go back to the castle and report to the king.

35067.<attr><feel_think_lv2><end_attr>「しばらく前 塔:
<attr><feel_think_lv2><end_attr>A while ago, some soldiers climbed up to the
top of the tower and never came down again.
Did something happen?

35068.「メギストリス名物 キラキラ大風車塔へ\n ようこそ！\n おや あんたは 討伐:
Welcome to Megistris' famous Glitter Windmill Tower! Well, you must be a strike force member. But I guess the other strike force
members are taking it easy. They haven't come down from the top of the tower yet.

35069.<attr><feel_angry_lv3><end_attr>「ほほう。くだら:
Oh-ho. It seems you have reported this nonsense to the king. It's impossible for the soldiers under Id-sama's direct command to
kill all the strike force. My king knows that very well. You liar.Get out of the Kingdom of Megistris!

35071.<attr><feel_think_lv1><end_attr>「頭に 王冠……:
<attr><feel_think_lv1><end_attr>A crown on your head? The king just passed by,
didn't he? The reclusive prince of the land?

35073.<attr><feel_think_lv2><end_attr>「なによぉ コワ:
What? You look scared. What? There's a bad guy on the tower? I thought there was no monster. Is there a monster after all? Is there a
monster or not? Please tell me which one it is.

35074.「メギストリス名物 キラキラ大風車塔へ\n ようこそ！\n<br>\n「プーポッ:
Welcome to Megistris' famous Glitter Windmill
Tower! King Puupoppan and his entourage Id
climbed to the top of the tower some time ago.

35075.<attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>「とうとう プーポッ:
At last, King Puupoppan is on his way to the Ritual Hall. Soon the royal ceremony will begin. You! I didn't know you were still in
this country! You dare to interfere with the ceremony this time? Prince Raguas! The prince is Prince Raguas. Please understand the king's
decision.

35076.「大風車塔の上から ものすごい光が\n 辺り一帯を 照らしだしたんだ。\n あれ:
A tremendous light shone from the top of the great windmilltower, illuminating the whole area. Was that the power of the royal
ceremony?

35078.<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>「さっき すごか:
It was amazing just now! There was a sparkling light coming down from up in the sky! It was so beautiful, it made me cry. It was really
beautiful.

35079.<attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>「キラキラ大風車塔の:
A light was shining from the top of Glitter Windmill Tower. I see. A royal ceremony was performed. But what's done is done. We'll just
have to live in the peace that our king has given us.

35080.<attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>「ラグアス王子！\n:
<attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>Prince Raguas! Oh, no, Mr. Id, that Id guy did
that!

35082.「ここのカフェの 飲み物は\n 値段の割に 量が少なくってなあ。\n すぐに 飲:
The drinks at this cafe are not very generous
in quantity for the price. I finish them
quickly.

35084.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「ジュースばっか:
<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>I've been drinking a lot of juice and my
stomach is getting fat. I'm so full... so
full... so full...

35085.「くわしいことは 知らないが\n このキラキラ大風車塔の 上にある部屋は\n じ:
I don't know the details, but the rooms above
Glitter Windmill Tower will be closed soon.
Prince Raguas has given his immediate orders.

35086.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「メギストリス名:
<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>Welcome to Megistris Specialty Glitter
Windmill Tower! Welcome, travelers! Look up so
high your neck will get tired.

35087.「プーポッパン王ばかりでなく\n 討伐隊の者たちも この上で 命を落とした。\n:
Not only King Puupoppan but also the strike
force lost their lives up there. No wonder the
prince is thinking of closing down.
